contentrichtext.text: '''Yuhi III Gahindiro''' was the [[King of Rwanda|king]] (''Mwami'') of [[Rwanda]] from approximately 1797 to 1830, according to Rwandan tradition. It is not certain whether ''Yuhi III Gahindiro'' was a real or mythological person. {{s-start}} {{s-reg}} {{succession box| title=[[List of Kings of Rwanda|King of Rwanda]]| years=1797 – 1830 | before=[[Mibabwe III of Rwanda]]| after=[[Mutara II Rwogera]] }} {{s-end}} ==External links== *[http://www.king-kigeli.com/misc/m_monarchy.htm List of Kings of Rwanda] {{Persondata | NAME = Yuhi 03 Of Rwanda | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = King Of rwanda | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Yuhi 03 Of Rwanda}} [[Category:Rwandan kings]] [[Category:18th-century monarchs in Africa]] [[Category:19th-century monarchs in Africa]] {{Rwanda-bio-stub}} {{africa-royal-stub}}
